title: 1990년 United States v. Dario Restrepo 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: United States v. Dario Restrepo. 판결일: 1990-05-08. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Dario RESTREPO, Defendant-Appellant
**판결일**: 1990-05-08
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Boochever, Noonan, Pregerson

## 변호인

Ted J. Stepovich, Fairbanks, Alaska, for defendant-appellant., Stephen Cooper, Asst. U.S. Atty., Fairbanks, Alaska, for plaintiff-appellee.

## 인용

- 903 F.2d 648

## 판결문 요약

903 F.2d 648
    58 USLW 2707
    UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee,v.Dario RESTREPO, Defendant-Appellant.
    No. 88-3207.
    United States Court of Appeals,Ninth Circuit.
    Argued and Submitted April 6, 1989.Opinion Aug. 24, 1989.Opinion Withdrawn March 2, 1990.Decided May 8, 1990.
    
      Ted J. Stepovich, Fairbanks, Alaska, for defendant-appellant.
      Stephen Cooper, Asst. U.S. Atty., Fairbanks, Alaska, for plaintiff-appellee.
      Appeal from the United States District Court for the District of Alaska.
      Before PREGERSON, BOOCHEVER and NOONAN, Circuit Judges.
      BOOCHEVER, Circuit Judge:
    
    
      1
      Dario Restrepo appeals his forty-six month prison sentence imposed after he was convicted of two counts of distribution of cocaine.  The primary issue before us is whether the district court erred in considering conduct that did not result in Restrepo's conviction in determining his offense level under the Sentencing Guidelines.  We also consider the standard of proof to be used to establish a factor enhancing a sentence under the Guidelines, and whether the application of the June 15, 1988 Guidelines to Restrepo violated the ex post facto clause.  We affirm.
    
    BACKGROUND
    
      2
      On March 8, 1988, Restrepo was indicted on two counts of distribution of cocaine (counts I and II) under 21 U.S.C. Sec. 841(a)(1) (1988).1   His codefendant, Judith DeMaldonado, also was charged with distribution of cocaine in count II.  Addit...
